Teacher :
Form two circles, one inside the other.
Stand facing one another.
Children in the inner circle run a library.
They are standing at the library counter.
Children in the outer circle will visit

each person at the counter.
They will enquire about books in the library.
They may return or borrow books.
Practise the following dialogues in the circles.

At the Counter

2.
C : I want to return
these books and take
new ones.
L : Ok. Which books do
you want ?
C: 1 can’t think of any.
Please suggest a book.
L: Try ........ ;
I enjoyed it very much.
Cc: Ok, Pll try. Thanks.
: You are welcome.

C : Hello. Can I borrow
some books, please?

L_ : Which ones do
you want?

C : Story-books.

L : Look at these books.
You may borrow
two of them.

C : Thank you.

: Welcome.

3

: Can you lend me the DVD

of (a film)?

L : Sorry. It’s issued out.
Someone else has taken it.

C : Never mind. Ill take it

some other time.
